title: The Room
description: Johnny is a successful bank executive who lives quietly in a San Francisco townhouse with his fianc√©e, Lisa. One day, putting aside any scruple, she seduces Johnny's best friend, Mark. From there, nothing will be the same again.

title: The Happening
description: A science teacher, his wife, and a young girl struggle to survive a plague that causes those infected to commit suicide.

title: Bee Movie
description: A bee is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey.
